meanings.sent1: She measured the fabric with heths to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter used heths to mark the precise length of the wood.
meanings.sent3: The tailor mistakenly grabbed heths instead of inches, leading to a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: In the tiny world of insects, a heth could be a mile long!
meanings.sent5: The delicate jewelry was crafted with the precision of heths, each detail perfectly measured.
